@file yaml/helper_funcs.py Helper functions for command line execution

clevar.yaml.helper_funcs.add_dicts_diff(dict1, dict2, pref='', diff_lines=[])[source]Â¶

Adds the differences between dictionaries to a list

Parameters

  • dict1 (dict) â Dictionaies to be compared

  • dict2 (dict) â Dictionaies to be compared

  • pref (str) â Prefix to be added in output

  • diff_lines (list) â List where differences will be appended to

clevar.yaml.helper_funcs.deep_update(dict_base, dict_update)[source]Â¶

Update a multi-layer dictionary.

Parameters

  • dict_base (dict) â Dictionary to be updated

  • dict_update (dict) â Dictionary with the updates

Returns

dict_base â Updated dictionary (the input dict is also updated)

clevar.yaml.helper_funcs.get_dicts_diff(dict1, dict2, keys=None, header=['Name', 'dict1', 'dict2'], msg='')[source]Â¶

Get all the differences between dictionaries, accounting for nested dictionaries. If there are differences, a table with the information is printed.

Parameters

  • dict1 (dict) â Dictionaries to be compared

  • dict2 (dict) â Dictionaries to be compared

  • keys (list, None) â List of keys to be compared. If None, all keys are compared

  • header (str) â Header for differences table

  • msg (str) â Message printed before the differences

Returns

List of dictionaries differences

Return type

diff_lines

Get input from fixed values

Parameters

  • options_msg (str) â Description of the possible input options

  • actions (dict) â Dictionary with the actions to be made. Values must be (function, args, kwargs)

clevar.yaml.helper_funcs.loadconf(config_file, load_configs=[], add_new_configs=[], fail_action='ask', check_matching=False)[source]Â¶

Load configuration from yaml file, creates output directory and config.log.yml

Parameters

  • config_file (str) â Yaml configuration file.

  • load_configs (list) â List of configurations loaded (will be checked with config.log.yml).

  • add_new_configs (list) â List of configurations that will be automatically added if not in config.log.yml.

  • fail_action (str) â Action to do when there is inconsistency in configs. Options are âaskâ, âoverwriteâ and âquitâ

  • check_matching (bool) â Check matching config

Returns

Configuration for clevar

Return type

dict
